private_directory.name: Amazon DSP (Delivery Service Partner)
private_directory.description: Start your own delivery business with Amazon. DSP owners manage teams of drivers delivering Amazon packages. Requires $10K liquid capital minimum.
private_directory.requirements: Business entity, $10K+ liquid capital, pass background check

private_directory.name: Amazon Flex
private_directory.description: Deliver Amazon packages using your own vehicle on flexible schedules. Independent contractor gig work for individual drivers.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, own vehicle, smartphone, pass background check

private_directory.name: FedEx Ground ISP (Independent Service Provider)
private_directory.description: Own and operate FedEx Ground delivery routes. ISP model allows owning multiple routes and managing driver teams.
private_directory.requirements: Business entity, significant capital investment, fleet of vehicles

private_directory.name: Uber Freight
private_directory.description: Book and manage freight loads through Uber Freight platform. For carriers and owner-operators with CDL and commercial vehicles.

private_directory.name: XPO Logistics
private_directory.description: Partner with XPO for last-mile, LTL, and truckload freight opportunities. Independent contractor and fleet owner programs available.
private_directory.requirements: CDL, commercial vehicle, insurance, MC/DOT authority

private_directory.name: Uber (Rideshare)
private_directory.description: Drive passengers or deliver food with Uber and Uber Eats in the Boston/Massachusetts market.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, vehicle meeting requirements, background check

private_directory.name: Lyft
private_directory.description: Rideshare driving in Massachusetts. Flexible scheduling with passenger transport throughout the Boston metro area.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, vehicle meeting requirements, background check

private_directory.name: DoorDash
private_directory.description: Food and grocery delivery in Massachusetts. Flexible gig work as an independent Dasher contractor.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, vehicle/bike/scooter, smartphone, background check

private_directory.name: Instacart
private_directory.description: Grocery shopping and delivery service. Shop and deliver groceries to customers in Massachusetts.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, vehicle, smartphone, ability to lift 40+ lbs

private_directory.name: Grubhub
private_directory.description: Food delivery in the Greater Boston area and across Massachusetts. Flexible scheduling as independent delivery partner.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, vehicle, smartphone, background check

private_directory.name: Modivcare (formerly Providence Service Corp)
private_directory.description: Major NEMT broker operating in Massachusetts. Contracts with Medicaid/Medicare plans for non-emergency medical transportation. Seeking qualified transport providers.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, compliant vehicles, trained drivers, insurance

private_directory.name: MTM Inc
private_directory.description: National NEMT broker managing transportation for health plans. Active in Massachusetts Medicaid transportation network.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, compliant vehicles, background checks, insurance

private_directory.name: Veyo
private_directory.description: Technology-driven NEMT platform. Connects qualified drivers with non-emergency medical transport rides. Active in multiple states including MA.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, 4-door vehicle, smartphone, background check
